content.question: Which of the following historical developments most directly contributed to support for the policy described in the excerpt?

choices.label: Increased cotton production in the South
Innovations in textile manufacturing in the Northeast
Expanded railroad construction in the Midwest
Adoption of telegraph communication in the West

content.answer: Innovations in textile manufacturing in the Northeast

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
